page.title: 17BUCKERELL
page.content:
BUCKERELL IS A SMALL VILLAGE IN A FARMING COMMUNITY. IT USED TO HAVE A POST OFFICE AND A SCHOOL BUT NOW HAS NEITHER. OF SERVICE TO THE COMMUNITY IS THE CHURCH OF ST. MARY & ST. GILES, WHICH IS WITHIN THE PARISH BOUNDARY OF FENITON. MANY OF THE FARMS IN THE VICINITY HAVE BEEN MADE INTO GUEST HOUSES. PLANS ARE IN PROGRESS FOR A CHILDREN'S PLAYPARK BEHIND BUCKERELL LODGE. VILLAGE MEETINGS ARE HELD IN A PRIVATE HOUSE AS THERE IS NO LONGER ANY OTHER SORT OF MEETING PLACE. BUCKERELL HOSTS A COMMUNITY OF FARMING FAMILIES WHO HAVE KEPT THE FARM IN THE FAMILY THROUGH THE AGES. ALSO IT HAS SOME YOUNG SHORT STAY CAREER MINDED HOPEFULS.
* * * * * * * * * *
